title: How to unsubscribe from Audible
description: You can cancel your Audible membership on the Audible website. If you subscribed through the App Store or Google Play Store, you must cancel directly through those services.

steps_1.title: Cancel Audible Membership via Web Browser
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Audible membership via a web browser, follow these steps:

*   Go to the Audible website in a browser and sign in with your Amazon account.
*   Select your username from the top navigation.
*   Select "Account Details".
*   Select "Cancel membership".
*   Confirm by selecting "Continue to cancel" until you see the confirmation page.
*   Select your reason for cancellation and click "Submit".

steps_2.title: Cancel Audible Membership via Mobile Web
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Audible membership via the mobile web, follow these steps:

*   On mobile web, select the main menu (hamburger button), then your name, then "View membership details", then "Cancel membership".
*   Scroll to the bottom of the next page and select "Continue cancelling", then "Cancel anyway".
*   Select your reason for cancellation and click "Submit".

seo_text: Cancel Audible subscription. Steps to cancel Audible membership. How to stop paying for Audible. End Audible subscription.
